title: Let There Be LIGHT!
body_text:
We here at EastCoastDodgeball can confirm that at about 8:15pm Wednesday, April 16, the large, tennis lights that shine upon the dodgeball battlegrounds were brightly lit. It is not known if they stayed on until the normal 10:30 mark or if they will continue to properly function once Saturday's DODGEBALL 134 rolls around. "The Writer" however is still very pleased to inform all of you of the good news."
Don't forget about the third and final
Battle Royal
set to take place for this Saturday's DODGEBALL 134. The mid-season main event will also be announced and rumors concerning that blockbuster are already running rampant.
body_html:
We here at EastCoastDodgeball can confirm that at about 8:15pm Wednesday, April 16, the large, tennis lights that shine upon the dodgeball battlegrounds were brightly lit. It is not known if they stayed on until the normal 10:30 mark or if they will continue to properly function once Saturday's DODGEBALL 134 rolls around. "The Writer" however is still very pleased to inform all of you of the good news."

Don't forget about the third and final Battle Royal set to take place for this Saturday's DODGEBALL 134. The mid-season main event will also be announced and rumors concerning that blockbuster are already running rampant.
